item.title: CVE-2024-35691|2024-06-08T14:38:09.124Z -- marketing%20fire%2C%20llc -- widget%20options%20-%20extended
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Marketing Fire, LLC Widget Options - Extended.This issue affects Widget Options - Extended: from n/a through 5.1.0.
